Break the Bonds.name: Break the Bonds
Break the Bonds.flavor: You will not bow to an outside force.
Break the Bonds.channelDivinity: You can use only one Channel Divinity power per encounter.
Break the Bonds.trigger: You are dominated, immobilized, petrified, or restrained

Three Moonbeams.name: Three Moonbeams
Three Moonbeams.flavor: Your arrows glow with moonlight, bathing your targets with a cold radiance and granting your allies a chance to reposition themselves.
Three Moonbeams.requirement: You must be wielding a bow.
Three Moonbeams.onHit: 1[W] + Wisdom or Charisma modifier cold and radiant damage per attack, and each ally adjacent to the target can shift 1 square as a free action. If you target only one creature, the attack deals 1[W] extra damage.

Moon Shot.name: Moon Shot
Moon Shot.flavor: You gather the moonâ€™s white light around your arrow and fire it at your enemy, chilling it to the bone. To your ally, the light becomes a healing balm.
Moon Shot.requirement: You must be wielding a bow.
Moon Shot.onHit: 5[W] + Wisdom or Charisma modifier cold and radiant damage.
Moon Shot.effect: Each ally adjacent to the target can spend a healing surge.

Moon Eye.name: Moon Eye
Moon Eye.flavor: No darkness can blind you when you carry the moon in your heart.
Moon Eye.effect: Until the end of the encounter you gain darkvision and cannot be blinded.
